description: The govt’s Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) scheme for subsidies has resulted in significant savings across welfare schemes. Here’s how much the govt has mopped up by weeding out of duplicate beneficiaries and streamlining processes.
caption: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
message: Know more about how DBT is benefitting people and #TransformingIndia http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/DBT-brings-big-benefits/articleshow/52205118.cms
